title: Anime Review: One Piece 479
author: Population GO
description: In-depth review of Episode 479 focusing on Luffy's final stretch run towards the platform that holds his brother Ace, and the revelation that Luffy was born with Conqueror's Haki.

title: Episode 171 - Episodes 477-479 Rewatch: Luffy Stuns the World at Marineford!!!

description: Sunny Go Podcast covers episodes 477-479, discussing how things start to become desperate as Luffy has to push himself to dangerous limits with the Marines overwhelming the Whitebeard pirates.
